select count(1)as rs ,replace(replace(C.QYFWBID, '[ { "$oid" : "', ''), '"}]', '') as fwbid, replace(replace(C.qyjgid, '[ { "$oid" : "', ''), '"}]', '') as qyjgid, replace(replace(C.qytdmc, '[ "', ''), '"]', '') as qytdmc
from (select * from Tb_JTYS_PATIENT_SIGN a inner join Tb_JTYS_PATIENT_SIGN_DETAIL b on a.GRQYLSH = b.GRQYLSH where a.zhzt = 'approved' AND substr(a.QYSXKSSJ, 0, 7) = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm')) c inner join Tb_JTYS_SERVICE_PACKAGE d on replace(replace(C.QYFWBID, '[ { "$oid" : "', ''), '"}]', '') = replace(replace(d.FWBID, '{ "$oid" : "', ''), '"}', '') where d.zt = 'T'
group by C.QYFWBID,qyjgid,qytdmc

select replace(replace(qyrxm,'[ "',''),'"]','') as qyrxm, replace(replace(qyrsfzhm,'[ "',''),'"]','') as qyrsfzhm, replace(replace(qyfamc,'[ "',''),'"]','') as qyfamc, replace(replace(qyfwbmc,'[ "',''),'"]','') as qyfwbmc, replace(replace(qytdmc,'[ "',''),'"]','') as qytdmc, replace(replace(qyysxm,'[ "',''),'"]','') as qyysxm from (select * from Tb_JTYS_PATIENT_SIGN a inner join Tb_JTYS_PATIENT_SIGN_DETAIL b on a.GRQYLSH = b.GRQYLSH where a.zhzt = 'approved' AND substr(a.QYSXKSSJ, 0, 7) = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm')) c inner join Tb_JTYS_SERVICE_PACKAGE d on replace(replace(C.QYFWBID, '[ { "$oid" : "', ''), '"}]', '') = replace(replace(d.FWBID, '{ "$oid" : "', ''), '"}', '') where d.zt = 'T'
